LanguageData.RK_Ballista_Strait_Body.label: ballista
LanguageData.RK_Ballista_Strait_Body.description: A siege engine capable of firing large arrows at great distances. It is designed to be operated even by Ratkins.
LanguageData.RK_Turret_Ballista_Strait.label: ballista
LanguageData.RK_Turret_Ballista_Strait.description: A siege engine capable of firing large arrows at great distances. It is designed to be operated even by Ratkins.
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Normal.label: ballista bolt (normal)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Normal.description: A ballista bolt. Survival is unlikely if the target gets hit directly by this big arrow.
LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaBolt_Normal.label: ballista bolt (normal)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Heavy.label: ballista bolt (HE)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Heavy.description: A specialized ballista bolt tipped with an explosive warhead to increase lethality over a wider area.
LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaBolt_HE.label: ballista bolt (HE)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_AP.label: ballista bolt (AP)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_AP.description: A specialized ballista bolt designed to penetrate armor, it can penetrate multiple targets along its firing line.
LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaBolt_AP.label: ballista bolt (AP)
LanguageData.RK_Cannon_Strait_Body.label: Ratkin Cannon
LanguageData.RK_Cannon_Strait_Body.description: A cannon that can fire polished stones at a long distance. Developed to subdue enemies from a distance, but cannot shoot over hills. Nicknamed Squeak Cannon by its crews.
LanguageData.RK_Turret_Cannon_Strait.label: Cannon
LanguageData.RK_Turret_Cannon_Strait.description: A cannon that can fire polished stones at a long distance. Developed to subdue enemies from a distance, but cannot shoot over hills. Nicknamed Squeak Cannon by its crews.
LanguageData.Big_mouse.label: Ratkin Cannon Shell
LanguageData.Big_mouse.description: A cannon shell that made out of polished stone encased in steel.
LanguageData.Bullet_Big_mouse.label: Ratkin Cannon Shell
